name: azimutt
description: Next-Gen ERD: Design, Explore, Document and Analyze your database.

scripts.setup: npm run libs:setup && npm run fe:setup && npm run ex:setup
scripts.install: npm run libs:install && npm run fe:install && npm run cli:install && npm run desktop:install && npm run be:install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run tailwind:start" "npm run ts:start" "npm run elm:start" "npm run ex:start"
scripts.test: npm run libs:test && npm run ex:test && npm run elm:test && npm run ts:test && npm run cli:test
scripts.format: npm run ex:format && npm run elm:format
scripts.lint: npm run ex:lint && npm run elm:lint && npm run ts:lint
scripts.build: npm run libs:build && npm run tailwind:build && npm run ts:build && npm run elm:build && npm run ex:build
scripts.docker: mix local.hex --force && mix deps.get && npm run libs:setup && npm run fe:docker
scripts.update: npm update --save-dev && npm update --save && npm install && npm run libs:update && npm run ex:update && npm run fe:update && npm run cli:update && npm run desktop:update && npm run be:update
scripts.libs:setup: cd libs/utils && npm run setup && cd ../database-types && npm run setup && cd ../shared && npm run setup && cd ../json-infer-schema && npm run setup && cd ../connector-couchbase && npm run setup && cd ../connector-mongodb && npm run setup && cd ../connector-postgres && npm run setup
scripts.libs:install: cd libs/utils && npm install && cd ../database-types && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install && cd ../json-infer-schema && npm install && cd ../connector-couchbase && npm install && cd ../connector-mongodb && npm install && cd ../connector-postgres && npm install
scripts.libs:test: cd libs/utils && npm test && cd ../database-types && npm test && cd ../shared && npm test && cd ../json-infer-schema && npm test && cd ../connector-couchbase && npm test && cd ../connector-mongodb && npm test && cd ../connector-postgres && npm test
scripts.libs:build: cd libs/utils && npm run build && cd ../database-types && npm run build && cd ../shared && npm run build && cd ../json-infer-schema && npm run build && cd ../connector-couchbase && npm run build && cd ../connector-mongodb && npm run build && cd ../connector-postgres && npm run build
scripts.libs:update: cd libs/utils && npm run update && cd ../database-types && npm run update && cd ../shared && npm run update && cd ../json-infer-schema && npm run update && cd ../connector-couchbase && npm run update && cd ../connector-mongodb && npm run update && cd ../connector-postgres && npm run update
scripts.ex:setup: cd backend && mix deps.get && mix ecto.setup
scripts.ex:install: cd backend && mix local.hex --force && mix deps.get
scripts.cli:update: cd cli && npm run run update
